alert.note: Alert for Blue Earth; Watonwan (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 10 at 11:53PM CDT by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Blue Earth, southeastern Watonwan and southwestern Waseca Counties through 1230 AM CDT... At 1153 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Vernon Center, or 15 miles southwest of Mankato, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Good Thunder around 1205 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Mapleton, St. Clair, Pemberton and Waldorf. This includes U.S. Highway 169 between mile markers 26 and 53. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 200 AM CDT for south central Minnesota.
